item.title: [TuT]New Skills Menu[TuT]
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“Denoria, post:7, topic:273474”][quote author=Setsuna link=topic=361395.msg2751581#msg2751581 date=1239935855]

Post your own work

Thanks,
Denoria.

Posted it on here for a friend that cannot get on the website it was on. Like I stated, I DIDN’T MAKE IT. I don’t take any credit for it. I’m just posting it here for people who are too stupid to go to “the other website” and find it themselves.

Exactly why this site has just about no tutorials, everyone’s such an asshole that when someone posts something useful…All they get is CRAP for responds, meanwhile…The people who actually NEED it are shit outa luck when the person who posted it gets fed up and fuckin’ removes it.

kthxbai,
Set
[/quote]Oh, i thought you just copied and pasted from eg: google, google, if its for a friend, my bad lo.

Edit: Dun blame me, i get shit all the time, their called moparfags. calm your self.

kthxbai,
Denoria[/quote]

Sorry, was in a bit of a bad mood when I wrote that…

And yeah, my friend wanted it for a client he’s workin’ on…So I posted it here.

kthxbai xD

Read full topic

item.title: [TuT]New Skills Menu[TuT]
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Serverside
The serverside part is for Emulous base, if your using a different base then you will have to convert it. You will have to code contruction, hunter and summoning serverside yourself, im only including the orginal skills.

go to players and open up PlayerAssistant.java

search for

public void refreshSkill

and replace the whole method with this, btw i didnt remove the sendframes for the old interface incase you still wanted it.

[code]/**

  • Refeshes all skill levels and experience,

  • This is called regualy.

  • */
    public void refreshSkill(int i) {

      switch (i) {

  	
  	case 0://attack
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[0] + "", 4004);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + "", 4005);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[0] + "", 4044);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + 1) + "", 4045);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[0]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0])+"", 16227 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[0] + "", 16227 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + 1) + "", 16227 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + 1) - c.playerXP[0]) + "", 16227 + 7);
  	break;
  	
  	case 1://defence
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[1] + "", 4008);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + "", 4009);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[1] + "", 4056);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + 1) + "", 4057);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[1]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1])+"", 16253 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[1] + "", 16253 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + 1) + "", 16253 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + 1) - c.playerXP[1]) + "", 16253 + 7);
  	break;
  	
  	case 2://strength
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + "", 4007);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[2] + "", 4050);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + 1) + "", 4051);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[2]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2])+"", 16245 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[2] + "", 16245 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + 1) + "", 16245 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + 1) - c.playerXP[2]) + "", 16245 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 3://hitpoints
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[3] + "", 4016);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + "", 4017);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[3] + "", 4080);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])+1) + "", 4081);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[3]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])+"", 16293 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[3] + "", 16293 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + 1) + "", 16293 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + 1) - c.playerXP[3]) + "", 16293 + 7);
  	break;
  	
  	case 4://range
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[4] + "", 4010);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + "", 4011);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[4] + "", 4062);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + 1) + "", 4063);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[4]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4])+"", 16261 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[4] + "", 16261 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + 1) + "", 16261 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + 1) - c.playerXP[4]) + "", 16261 + 7);


  	break;
  	
  	case 5://prayer
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[5] + "", 4012);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + "", 4013);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[5] + "", 4068);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + 1) + "", 4069);
  		sendFrame126("Prayer: "+c.playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])+"", 687);//Prayer frame
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])+"", 16269 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[5] + "", 16269 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + 1) + "", 16269 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + 1) - c.playerXP[5]) + "", 16269 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 6://magic
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[6] + "", 4014);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + "", 4015);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[6] + "", 4074);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + 1) + "", 4075);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[6]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6])+"", 16277 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[6] + "", 16277 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + 1) + "", 16277 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + 1) - c.playerXP[6]) + "", 16277 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 7://cooking
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[7] + "", 4034);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + "", 4035);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[7] + "", 4134);
  		sendFrame126("" +getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + 1) + "", 4135);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[7]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7])+"", 16373 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[7] + "", 16373 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + 1) + "", 16373 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + 1) - c.playerXP[7]) + "", 16373 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 8://woodcutting
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[8] + "", 4038);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + "", 4039);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[8] + "", 4146);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + 1) + "", 4147);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[8]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8])+"", 16389 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[8] + "", 16389 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + 1) + "", 16389 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + 1) - c.playerXP[8]) + "", 16389 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 9://fletching
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[9] + "", 4026);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9]) + "", 4027);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[9] + "", 4110);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9]) + 1) + "", 4111);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[9]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9])+"", 16333 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[9] + "", 16333 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9]) + 1) + "", 16333 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9]) + 1) - c.playerXP[9]) + "", 16333 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 10://fishing
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[10] + "", 4032);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + "", 4033);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[10] + "", 4128);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + 1) + "", 4129);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[10]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10])+"", 16365 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[10] + "", 16365 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + 1) + "", 16365 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + 1) - c.playerXP[10]) + "", 16365 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 11://firemaking
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[11] + "", 4036);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + "", 4037);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[11] + "", 4140);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + 1) + "", 4141);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[11]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11])+"", 16381 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[11] + "", 16381 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + 1) + "", 16381 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + 1) - c.playerXP[11]) + "", 16381 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 12://crafting
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[12] + "", 4024);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + "", 4025);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[12] + "", 4104);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + 1) + "", 4105);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[12]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12])+"", 16325 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[12] + "", 16325 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + 1) + "", 16325 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + 1) - c.playerXP[12]) + "", 16325 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 13://smithing
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[13] + "", 4030);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) + "", 4031);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[13] + "", 4122);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) + 1) + "", 4123);

  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) + 1) - c.playerXP[13]) + "", 16357 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 14://mining
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[14] + "", 4028);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + "", 4029);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[14] + "", 4116);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + 1)+ "", 4117);
  		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[14]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14])+"", 16349 + 4);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[14] + "", 16349 + 5);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + 1) + "", 16349 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + 1) - c.playerXP[14]) + "", 16349 + 7);

  	break;
  	
  	case 15://herblore
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[15] + "", 4020);
  		sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) + "", 4021);
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[15] + "", 4092);
  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) + 1) + "", 4093);

  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) + 1) - c.playerXP[15]) + "", 16309 + 7);

  	case 16://agility
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[16] + "", 4018);

  	case 20://runecrafting
  		sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[20] + "", 4152);

  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]) + 1) + "", 4158);

  		sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]) + 1) + "", 16285 + 6);
  		sendFrame126("" + (getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]) + 1) - c.playerXP[20]) + "", 16285 + 7);

  	break;
  }

    }

notes

* the sendframe id for the total level is 16435
* you will not need to change the setsidebar because this replaces the old interface.[/code]

ONCE AGAIN, I DID NOT MAKE THIS! ALL CREDIT GOES TO BLOOD ISLE!!! I TAKE NO CREDIT FOR IT WHATSOEVER.

item.title: [TuT]New Skills Menu[TuT]
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

and finally add this…

public static void Skillsdata(StreamLoader streamloader, TextDrawingArea atextdrawingarea[]) { String s = ""; int i = 0; addExp(16238, "Current Xp:", atextdrawingarea, 1, 0); addExp(16239, "Next level:", atextdrawingarea, 1, 0); addExp(16240, "Remainder:", atextdrawingarea, 1, 0); addText(16429, "85", atextdrawingarea, 0, 0xffff00); addText(16430, "85", atextdrawingarea, 0, 0xffff00); addText(16431, "85", atextdrawingarea, 0, 0xffff00); addText(16432, "85", atextdrawingarea, 0, 0xffff00); addText(16433, "85", atextdrawingarea, 0, 0xffff00); addText(16434, "85", atextdrawingarea, 0, 0xffff00); addText(16435, "Total Level: 1284", atextdrawingarea, 2, 0xffff00); addSkill(16227, "Attack:", -65, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16245, "Strength:", -59, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16253, "Defence:", -60, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16261, "Ranged:", -63, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16269, "Prayer:", -65, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16277, "Magic:", -68, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16285, "Runecraft:", -55, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16293, "Hitpoints:", -58, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16301, "Agility:", -65, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16309, "Herblore:", -60, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16317, "Thieving:", -60, 0, atextdrawingarea); addSkill(16325, "Crafting:", -60, 0, atextdrawingarea); item.title: [TuT]New Skills Menu[TuT]
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]THIS IS NOT MINE. I DID NOT CREATE THIS!!! ALL CREDIT GOES TO BLOOD ISLE[/size][/size][/size]

http://toprunetips.co.uk/frostrealm/CUSTOM%2029.png

http://toprunetips.co.uk/frostrealm/CUSTOM%2030.png

first open up RSInterface.java and Make sure you have these methods

private static Sprite BloodIsleSpriteLoader(int i, String s) { long l = (TextClass.method585(s) << 8) + (long)i; Sprite sprite = (Sprite)aMRUNodes_238.insertFromCache(l); if(sprite != null) { return sprite; } try { sprite = new Sprite((new StringBuilder()).append(signlink.findcachedir()).append("signframe/Custom/").append(s).append(" ").append(i).append(".png").toString()); aMRUNodes_238.removeFromCache(sprite, l); } catch(Exception exception) { return null; } return sprite; }

[code]public static void drawYellowBox(int id, int width, int height)
{
RSInterface rsinterface = interfaceCache[id + 1] = new RSInterface();
rsinterface.parentID = id + 1;
rsinterface.id = id + 1;
rsinterface.type = 3;
rsinterface.atActionType = 0;
rsinterface.anInt214 = 0;
rsinterface.width = width;
rsinterface.height = height;
rsinterface.aByte254 = 0;
rsinterface.anInt230 = -1;
rsinterface.aBoolean227 = true;
rsinterface.textColor = 0;
rsinterface.anInt219 = 0;
rsinterface.anInt216 = 0;
rsinterface.anInt239 = 0;
rsinterface = addTab(id + 2);
rsinterface.parentID = id + 2;
rsinterface.id = id + 2;
rsinterface.type = 3;
rsinterface.atActionType = 0;
rsinterface.anInt214 = 0;
rsinterface.width = width - 2;
rsinterface.height = height - 2;
rsinterface.aByte254 = 0;
rsinterface.anInt230 = -1;
rsinterface.aBoolean227 = true;
rsinterface.textColor = 0xffffa0;
rsinterface.anInt219 = 0;
rsinterface.anInt216 = 0;
rsinterface.anInt239 = 0;
rsinterface = addTab(id);
rsinterface.children = new int[2];
rsinterface.childX = new int[2];
rsinterface.childY = new int[2];
rsinterface.children[0] = id + 1;
rsinterface.childX[0] = 0;
rsinterface.childY[0] = 0;
rsinterface.children[1] = id + 2;
rsinterface.childX[1] = 1;
rsinterface.childY[1] = 1;

}[/code]

public static void addText(int i, String s, TextDrawingArea atextdrawingarea[], int j, int k) { RSInterface rsinterface = addTab(i); rsinterface.parentID = i; rsinterface.id = i; rsinterface.type = 4; rsinterface.atActionType = 0; rsinterface.width = 174; rsinterface.height = 11; rsinterface.anInt214 = 0; rsinterface.aByte254 = 0; rsinterface.anInt230 = -1; rsinterface.aBoolean223 = true; rsinterface.aBoolean268 = true; rsinterface.textDrawingAreas = atextdrawingarea[j]; rsinterface.message = s; rsinterface.aString228 = ""; rsinterface.textColor = k; rsinterface.anInt219 = 0; rsinterface.anInt216 = 0; rsinterface.anInt239 = 0; }

public static void addExp(int i, String s, TextDrawingArea atextdrawingarea[], int j, int k) { RSInterface rsinterface = addTab(i); rsinterface.parentID = i; rsinterface.id = i; rsinterface.type = 4; rsinterface.atActionType = 0; rsinterface.width = 174; rsinterface.height = 11; rsinterface.anInt214 = 0; rsinterface.aByte254 = 0; rsinterface.anInt230 = -1; rsinterface.aBoolean223 = true; rsinterface.aBoolean268 = false; rsinterface.textDrawingAreas = atextdrawingarea[j]; rsinterface.message = s; rsinterface.aString228 = ""; rsinterface.textColor = k; rsinterface.anInt219 = 0; rsinterface.anInt216 = 0; rsinterface.anInt239 = 0; }

public static void addSpellClick2(int i, int j, int k) { RSInterface rsinterface = interfaceCache[i] = new RSInterface(); rsinterface.id = i; rsinterface.parentID = i; rsinterface.type = 5; rsinterface.atActionType = 1; rsinterface.anInt214 = 0; rsinterface.width = 2; rsinterface.height = 2; rsinterface.aByte254 = 0; rsinterface.anInt230 = 52; rsinterface.sprite1 = BloodIsleSpriteLoader(j, "custom"); rsinterface.sprite2 = BloodIsleSpriteLoader(k, "custom"); }

Search for

aClass44 = streamloader;

below that add these

skills(); Skillsdata(aClass44, atextdrawingarea);

Ok now add this method, this is one of the main methods.

[code]public static void addSkill(int id, String skillName, int nameWidth, int skillWidth, TextDrawingArea atextdrawingarea[])
{
String s = “”;
int i = 0;

RSInterface rsinterface = addTab(id);//hover interface
rsinterface.parentID = 5608;
rsinterface.id = id;
rsinterface.type = 0;
addSpellClick2(id + 1, 180, 180);//hover image
addExp(id + 3, skillName, atextdrawingarea, 1, 0);
addExp(id + 4, "85/85", atextdrawingarea, 1, 0);
addExp(id + 5, "3,261,822", atextdrawingarea, 1, 0);
addExp(id + 6, "3,597,792", atextdrawingarea, 1, 0);
addExp(id + 7, "335,970", atextdrawingarea, 1, 0);
rsinterface.atActionType = 0;
rsinterface.width = 300;
rsinterface.height = 300;
rsinterface.aBoolean266 = true;
rsinterface.anInt214 = 0;
rsinterface.aByte254 = 0;
rsinterface.anInt230 = -1;
rsinterface.scrollMax = 0;
rsinterface.children = new int[9];
rsinterface.childX = new int[9];
rsinterface.childY = new int[9];
rsinterface.children[0] = 16235;//hover box
rsinterface.childX[0] = 0;
rsinterface.childY[0] = 0;
rsinterface.children[1] = id + 3;
rsinterface.childX[1] = nameWidth;
rsinterface.childY[1] = 2;
rsinterface.children[2] = id + 4;
rsinterface.childX[2] = skillWidth;
rsinterface.childY[2] = 4;
rsinterface.children[3] = id + 5;
rsinterface.childX[3] = 15;
rsinterface.childY[3] = 20;
rsinterface.children[4] = id + 6;
rsinterface.childX[4] = 15;
rsinterface.childY[4] = 37;
rsinterface.children[5] = id + 7;
rsinterface.childX[5] = 15;
rsinterface.childY[5] = 54;
rsinterface.children[6] = 16238;
rsinterface.childX[6] = -54;
rsinterface.childY[6] = 20;
rsinterface.children[7] = 16239;
rsinterface.childX[7] = -54;
rsinterface.childY[7] = 37;
rsinterface.children[8] = 16240;
rsinterface.childX[8] = -54;
rsinterface.childY[8] = 54;
rsinterface = addTab(id + 2);
rsinterface.id = id + 2;
    rsinterface.parentID = 5608;
    rsinterface.type = 5;
    rsinterface.atActionType = 1;
    rsinterface.width = 51;
    rsinterface.height = 29;
    rsinterface.anInt230 = id;
rsinterface.tooltip = "Select";

}[/code]

next add this
